message.body: I have a check from stonesoup to reprint last years ad
Great! Can you bring it with you in Sunday?
Yep, or sat. I wanna help w coatume closet
Ok. Im not sure what kind of details she gave you guys. I'll be meeting Lois at her place at 10pm. It would be great to do some organizing. I also want to plan the costumes for the dance pieces.
Have we put in a listing with 7days calendar yet? Do you want me to do that?
I got it. I email it out to all the print media. I'll send it to you when it's done.
I'll send you the formal press release, too.
